channel.title: Edge Computing on Lucas Chaufournier
channel.description: Recent content in Edge Computing on Lucas Chaufournier

item.title: Fast Transparent Virtual Machine Migration in Distributed Edge Clouds
Mobile Edge Clouds
item.description: My thesis will likely focus on edge clouds and their performance aspects. We are currently looking at modeling different properties of edge clouds and how they compare to standard data centers. This work is still early in its development. A brief summary of edge clouds can be found on our poster. To view it, click on the PDF button above.
